g.text: Manager selects option to create a course
System asks for the course creation data
createCourse(courseId, courseTitle, courseName, description, maxEnrollments, minEnrollments)
createCourse(courseId, courseTitle, courseName, description, maxEnrollments, minEnrollments)
buildCourse(courseId, courseTitle, courseName, description, maxEnrollments, minEnrollments)
